title: Sam Altman's firing at OpenAI reflects schism over future of AI development
relevance_explanation: This document is highly relevant to the research goals. It discusses the key issue surrounding Sam Altman's firing, including the divergence of opinion on AI development within OpenAI and its potential societal impacts. It implicates the power dynamics and the contested visions for the future of AI that could have motivated the board's decision.
summary: Sam Altman was ousted from OpenAI due to disagreements over the pace of AI deployment and safety procedures. This event highlights a schism in AI development philosophy and has significant implications for the future direction of the field.
